channel.title: [508] got slayre level requirements. but how to add message saying what level?
channel.description: ok i added 100% slayer tower with proper slayer levels required for them, but how do i make it say you need 10 slayer if you dont got the requiremnets. thanks.

item.title: [508] got slayre level requirements. but how to add message saying what level?
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

ok just use this adapt it to the npc and level:

	[code]case 2783: // Were npc goes this is dark best
		if (p.getLevelForXP(18) >= 95) // this is drop if they have the lvl 95 in slayer
			Engine.items.createGroundItem(532, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, p.username);
		if (p.getLevelForXP(18) >= 95) // they get this xp if they have the level
			p.appendExperience(31310, 18);
		else
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need 95 slayer to get slayer xp from this monster"); //this is the failed message saying you need the level
	break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: [508] got slayre level requirements. but how to add message saying what level?
